history.proof: intros n m H. destruct m. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - destruct n. + left. reflexivity. + assert (H0: S (S n) * S (S m) = S (S n) * S m + S (S n)). * rewrite <- Nat.mul_succ_r. reflexivity. * rewrite H in H0. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat H : n = n * 0 Unable to unify "1" with "0".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: assert (H0: S (S n) * S (S m) = S (S n) * S m + S (S n)).
assert (H1: S (S n) * S m + S (S n) = S (S n) * S m + S m).
exceptions.exn: In environment n, m : nat H : S n = S n * S m H0 : S (S n * S m) * S (S m) = S (S n * S m) * S m + S (S n * S m) Unable to unify "S (S (S n)) * S m" with "S (S n) * S m + S (S n)".

original: intros n m H. destruct m. - right. reflexivity. - destruct n. + left. reflexivity. + assert (H0: S (S n) * S (S m) = S (S n) * S m + S (S n)). * rewrite <- Nat.mul_succ_r. reflexivity. * rewrite H in H0. assert (H1: S (S n) * S m + S (S n) = S (S n) * S m + S m). { rewrite <- Nat.mul_succ_l. reflexivity. } rewrite H1 in H0. apply Nat.succ_inj in H0. discriminate H0.
